section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform : Features
section.p: DataNucleus is specification driven, not just implementing specifications but also passing whatever specification compatibility (e.g TCK) there is available. The primary features of the DataNucleus Access Platform releases are shown below.

subsection.name: Specification compliance

tr.td: L2 Cache : Oracle Coherence, EHCache, Cacheonix, JCache
RDBMS Connection Pooling : DBCP, C3P0, Proxool, BoneCP

subsection.p: [1] = partial support for nondurable identity : persistence but not update/delete
